metadata.author: Woona
metadata.desc:
Burst ion stunner which replaces vanilla ion stunner. Lanius A loses its stunner for basic ion because the ship is pretty strong anyway (it has hacking).
Kestrel C received a significant buff, getting the new upgraded burst stunner. The ship was pretty boring before, but now it has much stronger early game.
metadata.changelog:
Ion stunner replaced with Burst ion stunner (2 power, 2 shots, 11 sec charge time).
Lanius A: Ion stunner replaced with Basic Ion. Kestrel C: Ion stunner replaced with upgraded Burst Ion stunner (1 power, 2 shots, 10 sec charge time).
